channel.title: Cthulhu saves the world is fucking awesome
channel.description:
this games pure epic win, it's hilarious and it's got good game play to boot, I'm a sucker for oldschool games but even if your not into retro stuff it's still got great comedic value and an awesome soundtrack :3
plus it only cost 3 bucks and it also came with breath of death iv(another wicked game) :smiley:
anybody else play it yet?

item.title: Cthulhu saves the world is fucking awesome
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I got Breath of Death on XBIG, but haven’t gotten around to it yet. I did enjoy the demo, though. I’ll get around to it and Cthulu…eventually…

item.title: Cthulhu saves the world is fucking awesome
item.dc:creator: Stylosa
item.description:
Pheonix Wright:

this games pure epic win, it’s hilarious and it’s got good game play to boot, I’m a sucker for oldschool games but even if your not into retro stuff it’s still got great comedic value and an awesome soundtrack :3

plus it only cost 3 bucks and it also came with breath of death iv(another wicked game)

anybody else play it yet?

I put together a gameplay clip, and even from the first 25 minuets or so, theres loads of laughs to be had. Really is a top little game. Check out the clip!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WJQFDdxLDYY

Read full topic
item.source: Cthulhu saves the world is fucking awesome

item.title: Cthulhu saves the world is fucking awesome
item.dc:creator: gibbelin
item.description:
It’s pretty good. I got some good laughs in the half hour or so I played last night.

I’m actually surprised Lovecraft isn’t tapped more often for games. He’s referenced in everything from Quake to Alone in the Dark but the only serious game based on his work is DCOTE. I would think it would be a no-brainer to use his established IPs for all kinds of games (especially since they’re free).

Read full topic
